OOC: I hear ya. I get on for the first time today and there was 27 NBW messeges in my inbox. It's good though. Glad to see things picking up.

Kraftlos <kraftlos@...> wrote:          Yeah, I went on vacation last week and I still haven't gotten through all the mail.  Sorry if I'm taking a while to respond.
Dishwasher FTW!

  On Jan 10, 2008 8:26 AM, mattwo7 < Matfour@...> wrote:
            
  --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <warriorazure@...> wrote:
>
> Lol! I just noticed something funny! I don't post everyday so the
> messages accumulate until I read them all in a batch. And you know
> what, this is just like doing my dishes! Lol!
>


I visit about once a day and it's still like that for me, that is if
you mean doing your dishes is hard for you...

Be a better friend, newshound, and know-it-all with Yahoo! Mobile.  Try it now.
